title: Willa the Wolf has Show and Tell
description: Does your kids have a favorite toy? Do they understand the value of family? Willa the wolf is having trouble deciding what she  should bring into her class for show and tell. She lines up all her toys and tries to pick out the thing that means the most to her. She asks her mother,father,and brother for help. While she is trying to pick a toy that means something to her she realizes that there Are more important things than toys in her life.  A great read for the whole family. Told through gorgeous illustrations and flowing verse it is perfect for kids 0-5.
author: Leela Hope
